name: Locofy - Figma to React code (BETA)
description:
Convert your Figma designs into production ready front-end React code! Start building your product at lightning speed.


üé® Design

- With Locofy plugin, you can tag your design layers, define UX/behaviour and responsiveness rules, and add actions!

- If you're using UI libraries, simply tag your components as Material UI, Bootstrap, Ant Design... and voila!


üèó Prototype

- With Locofy, you'll automatically get a live, responsive prototype that runs on code, without writing code!


üíª Code

- Locofy.ai writes production ready front-end React code for you! We'll save you 50-60% of your time so you can focus on more complex problems.

- More frameworks like Vue, Angular, HTML-CSS, SwiftUI, Jetpack Compose/Kotlin, Flutter, React Native will be coming your way soon!


‚ñ∫ Watch Demo

‚ñ∫ Try Guided Sample Projects


Locofy 1 - BETA FEATURES

- Tag Layers

- Tag UI library components (Material UI, Ant Design and Bootstrap)

- Define UX/Behaviour & Responsiveness rules

- Add onClick Actions

- Live Prototype

- Code Export (React Project)

- Team Collaboration


Locofy 2 - COMING SOON

- Define Props

- Create Components

- Share Live Prototypes

- Drag and Drop Pre-Built Components

- Export Code and integrate with Github


‚ñ∫ Our plugin is in Beta - please feel free to share, the good and bad, we want it all. Reach us at help@locofy.ai


Current version: Locofy 1 BETA (v1.2.1)
